00022 #ifndef _CHIPSTREAM_PROBELIST_H_
00023 #define _CHIPSTREAM_PROBELIST_H_
00024 
00025 // commented out as the methods are ifdefed out.
00026 // #include <string>
00027 
00028 // ProbeList isnt used, as objects with virtual functions
00029 // have an extra ptr.  (Which doubles the size of ProbeListPacked.)
00030 
00031 /// A place to park functions and constants common to
00032 /// ProbeListPacked and ProbeListStl.
00033 class ProbeList {
00034 public:
00035   /// Annotations a specific block.
00036   enum BlockAnnotation {
00037     NoAnnotation,
00038     A_Allele,
00039     B_Allele,
00040     A_AlleleForward,
00041     B_AlleleForward,
00042     A_AlleleReverse,
00043     B_AlleleReverse
00044   };
00045 
00046   /// Use this symbolic value for an unset variable.
00047   static const int UNSET = -1;
00048   /// use this symbolic value for the null probe.
00049   static const int null_probe = -1;
00050 
00051   // ifdefed out as there are no users of these 
00052   // ProbeListPacked and ProbeListStl dont inherit from ProbeList.
00053   // (It would add a pointer for the virtual class for each object.
00054   // Which would make them too big.)
00055 
00056   // The intent is for both ProbeListPacked and ProbeListStl to have 
00057   // the same interface.  (As documented below.)
00058 
00059 #if 0
00060 
00061   virtual int get_type() const = 0;
00062   virtual void set_type(int type) = 0;
00063   
00064   // accessors
00065   virtual int block_cnt() const = 0;
00066   virtual int probe_cnt() const = 0;
00067   virtual int max_name_len() const = 0;
00068   //
00069   virtual int get_numMatch() const = 0;
00070   virtual void set_numMatch(int numMatch) = 0;
00071   //
00072   /// @todo add set_XXX(std::vector<int>);
00073   virtual int get_blockSize(int b) const = 0;
00074   virtual void set_blockSize(int b,int val) = 0;
00075   //
00076   virtual short get_blockAnn(int b) const = 0;
00077   virtual void set_blockAnn(int b,short val) = 0;
00078   //
00079   virtual int get_blockAllele(int b) const = 0;
00080   virtual void set_blockAllele(int b,int val) = 0;
00081   //
00082   virtual int get_blockContext(int b) const = 0;
00083   virtual void set_blockContext(int b,int val) = 0;
00084   //
00085   virtual int get_blockChannel(int b) const = 0;
00086   virtual void set_blockChannel(int b,uint8_t val) = 0;
00087 
00088   //
00089   virtual int get_probe(int b) const = 0;
00090   virtual void set_probe(int b,int val) = 0;
00091   //
00092   virtual int8_t get_probeDet(int d) const = 0;
00093   virtual void  set_probeDet(int d,int8_t val) = 0;
00094 
00095   //
00096   virtual void set_name(const std::string &name) = 0;
00097   // this shouldnt be used.
00098   virtual const char* get_name() const {
00099     return get_name_cstr();
00100   };
00101   // use this instead.
00102   virtual const char* get_name_cstr() const = 0;
00103   //
00104   virtual std::string get_name_string() const = 0;
00105 
00106 #endif
00107 };
00108 
00109 #endif // _CHIPSTREAM_PROBELIST_H_
